attributes.action: Make university undergraduate degrees less years to two.
attributes.additional_details:
Most people go from sixth form to university and can manage going to classes five times a day and for one year at a time and learn content and still do well yet university is three years and three days a week with less content even though people are a lot more mature and better multi taskers. In addition , most
People go on to do masters and placement years and manage to adjust again to less years so it should be the same for undergrad degree not three years .
attributes.background: Change the amount of years for a university undergraduate degree in the uk.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the length of university degree courses are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
